name: Lufthansa CityLine CRJ-701ER [D-ACPP] Onboard Takeoff from Frankfurt ᴴᴰ
description:
Hey everyone, this is the final leg of my trip, onboard a Lufthansa CityLine CRJ-700. Nothing too exciting about the takeoff itself, aside from the engine sound, but during the taxi, there's lots of cool aircraft. Namely, the Lufthansa A321 Retrojet, and the Lufthansa A380 that takes off right before us! That A380 just happened to be D-AIMG, the one I flew in on 3 hours earlier from Houston! I hope you guys enjoy the video, and watch in 1080p!
 
Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Lufthansa CityLine (CLH/CL)
Aircraft: Bombardier CRJ-700
Aircraft Name: "Torgau"
Engines: 2x GE CF34-8C1
Seat: 16F
Registration: D-ACPP
Route: FRA-RZE
Callsign: Hansaline 1384
Runway used: 18
Taxiway(s) used: L
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/DACPP
____________________________________________________

VIDEO LOG:
00:17 - Lufthansa A321 Retrojet close up
00:28 - Thai Airways A380 close up
00:35 - Lufthansa 747-8i and A320 visible
01:15 - Condor 767, AeroLogic 777F, Lufthansa Cargo MD-11F visible on cargo apron
01:25 - Maskargo 747-400F close up
01:32 - Lufthansa A380-800 D-AIMG close up
02:36 - Taxiing parallel to Lufthansa A380
03:26 - A380 taxies onto runway
03:55 - Holding short of Runway 18
04:18 - A380 begins takeoff roll
04:50 - Taxiing onto runway
05:40 - Engines spool up
06:20 - Rotate!
07:10 - Banking east
07:41 - Flaps up
